name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: An introduction to the basics of computer science.

name: Digital System
schedule: Lecture slots: F1, F2 Lab slots:  A2  /  B1 Note: Tutorials will be integrated with lectures.
grading: Quizzes – 20% Mid-sem and End-Sem exams – 40% Lab Evaluation – 40%
description: We will discuss concepts and designs of arithmetic circuits, state machines, registers, memories. At the end of the course, you will be able to design medium scale and large scale integrated circuits.
